root.name: Stardom: The A-List
root.description: OverviewStardom: The A-List is a simulation game developed and published by Glu Mobile for the Android, iPhone, and iPad platforms.Main StoryThe game begins with the main character, designed by the player, moving into a rundown part of town. Then he or she is introduced to the coffee shop, , where she can work for spare cash. Moreover, the protagonist then bumps into a prima donna actor or actress for supposedly flirting with that person's partner.Finally, the main character hooks up with a talent scout named Arnie, and begins to work on small budget ads and movies. To manage to public persona, the main character also finds Charlene, who was once Arnie's associate. Over time the main character's popularity begins to bloom and begins receiving calls to do shows on Broadway in New York City.
